decks.notes: This deck focuses on using powerful creatures like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Risen Reef to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Elemental creatures. The deck also includes a control aspect with cards like Supreme Verdict, Force of Negation, and Spell Snare to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Leyline Binding and Solitude provide additional removal options, while The One Ring and Subtlety offer versatility in dealing with various threats. By combining aggression with control elements, this Elemental-themed deck aims to secure victory by putting pressure on the opponent while maintaining board control.

This deck is built around assembling a combo using cards that do not rely on lands. The key strategy involves using cards like Hydroelectric Specimen and Tameshi, Reality Architect to generate a powerful board presence, while also disrupting the opponent's plays with cards like Sink into Stupor and Flare of Denial. The deck also includes ways to search for combo pieces with Whir of Invention and protect the combo with Pact of Negation. The win condition primarily revolves around using Goblin Charbelcher to deal damage directly to the opponent.

This deck focuses on utilizing Eldrazi creatures to ramp up your mana quickly and control the board with cards like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Return. Through the Breach allows you to cheat out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul or Ulamog, putting pressure on your opponent early in the game. With the support of cards like Ancient Stirrings and Grove of the Burnwillows, you can efficiently search for the cards you need to execute your strategy. By combining ramp and control elements, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with powerful Eldrazi threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing a powerful combo involving Goblin Charbelcher and a high storm count to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck does not rely on traditional lands for mana, instead using cards like Lotus Bloom and Hydroelectric Specimen to generate resources. Disrupting Shoal and Counterspell provide valuable protection for the combo pieces, while cards like Harbinger of the Seas and Thundertrap Trainer can clear the way for a lethal Charbelcher activation. The deck aims to win quickly and efficiently through its unique combo strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage to control the game. By disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells like Spell Snare and Counterspell, removing threats with cards like Lightning Bolt and Unholy Heat, and generating card advantage with cards like Snapcaster Mage and Mishra's Bauble, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent. The inclusion of Thundertrap Trainer and Enduring Curiosity provide additional ways to draw cards and maintain resources while maintaining control over the game.

This deck focuses on using Eldrazi creatures and powerful colorless spells to control the game while ramping up mana quickly. The deck aims to play big threats like Emrakul and Ulamog ahead of schedule using cards like Through the Breach and Eldrazi Temple. The deck also includes control elements like All Is Dust and Ugin's Labyrinth to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of cards like Grove of the Burnwillows and Karplusan Forest provides additional mana fixing and utility. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful Eldrazi creatures and spells.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells to quickly reduce their life total to zero. The deck includes powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Guide of Souls, supported by efficient removal like Lightning Bolt and Static Prison. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds consistency and an additional source of mana. With a mix of creatures, burn spells, and combat tricks, this Boros Aggro deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful multicolored creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive tactics. By combining cards that provide mana fixing and powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Territorial Kavu, the goal is to establish a strong board presence early on and maintain pressure throughout the game. With cards like Tribal Flames and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to deal direct damage, as well as Stubborn Denial for protection, this deck aims to win the game swiftly through a combination of creature combat and burn spells.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Amped Raptor, along with burn spells such as Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge. The inclusion of Goblin Bombardment and The One Ring allows for additional ways to deal damage and control the board. The deck also benefits from strong support cards like Static Prison and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to further bolster its aggressive strategy. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed in casting its powerful threats.
